title: "Regression plane concept for analysing continuous cellular processes with machine learning"
excerpt: "High-content screening prompted the development of software enabling discrete phenotypic analysis of single cells. Here, the authors show that supervised continuous machine learning can drive novel discoveries in diverse imaging experiments and present the Regression Plane module of Advanced Cell Classifier."
